original: Hallberg, Fritz Edward, civiliför-svarsdirektör, jägmästare, Mariestad, f. 5/6/98 i Sthlm av bankdir. Frans H. o. Lilly Rosenlind. G. 29 m. Na Salmonson. Barn: Inger f. 31, Stig 33. — Studiex. v. Östra real i Sthlm 17, utex. fr. skogshögsk. jägmäst:-kurs 22. E. jägmäst. 23, sekr. h. Riks-luftskyddsförb. 41, hemortsförsv :assi-st. i Sthlms län 42, civiilförsv :dir. i Skarab. län sed. 45. Stud;resa på of-fentl. uppdr. t. Finl. 44. Skr.: ett flertal skr. o. upps. ang. civilförsv.
translated: Hallberg, Fritz Edward, civil defense director, forester, Mariestad, born June 5, 1898, in Stockholm, son of bank director Frans H. and Lilly Rosenlind. Married in 1929 to Na Salmonson. Children: Inger (born 1931) and Stig (born 1933). He completed his studies at Östra real in Stockholm in 1917 and graduated from the forestry high school as a forester in 1922. He became a forester in 1923, was secretary at the National Air Protection Association in 1941, and served as a civil defense assistant in Stockholm County in 1942 before becoming civil defense director in Skaraborg County since 1945. He went on a study trip to Finland in 1944 on behalf of the government. He has written several works and papers on civil defense.

structured.name: Fritz Edward Hallberg
structured.description: Fritz Edward Hallberg was a Swedish civil defense director and forester.
